name: Button City Pokitto
description:
Button City for Pokitto!

Made for the Pokitto cute/demake jam.

Play as Fennel the fox as you explore your town, earn buttons, and spend them at the arcade. Based on art and characters from the game Button City

Post-Jam Version 1.1:

  • Added POP file
  • Reduced binary size (Pokitto Loader now works)
  • Fixed a few text & debugging remnants
